Articles.Content:
Just a quick question. What's the height (in meters) of the Kerbodyne S3-14400 tank? If you don't know what part that it is, it's the biggest tank added in 0.23.5, and also the biggest tank in KSP to date.

I'm thinking about recreating a KSP part or two in Roblox, and I need to know the height of the tank.
No idea, I really wish they made the new parts the same heights as all the other ones, it would make so much more sense...
It's same height as the Jumbo 64 tank -- 7.5m tall.
Wait, Roblox? I thought I was the only one who played that game.
I actually didn't realize they were the same height until I clipped a Jumbo tank inside the huge tank. You could see the ends of the Jumbo on both the top and bottom of the huge tank.
